txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The Living Deep has been invaded by the sappers of the Enemy, foul goblins skittering about through the caves, assaulting the forest from below. The more of the forest that they claim, the greater their war-machine becomes.\n\n'To defend ourselves, we must strike at our enemy. Head into the Living Deep and defeat the goblins within.'
'They will return, I have no doubt, but for tonight we can sleep without the ground rumbling.'
'When you are ready to brave the tunnels of the Living Deep, we can depart.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The goblins within the Living Deep are attempting to destroy the forest from below.
Defeated goblins in the Living Deep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat goblins in the Living Deep ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Goblins can be found in the Living Deep.
Dernstan is at Eaworth.\n\nDernstan will be pleased to hear you defeated several goblins within the Living Deep.
